cast.name: 让-吕克·戈达尔 Jean-Luc Godard

writer.name: 让-吕克·戈达尔 Jean-Luc Godard

director.name: 让-吕克·戈达尔 Jean-Luc Godard

this_title: Changer d'image - Lettre à la bien-aimée
trans_title: 改变形象 - 写给爱人的信
introduction: In 1981, after the presidential elections in France, and the arrival of the french socialists in gouvernement, the french TV asks to Godard to make a movie about the idea of change.Godard, finally, made a short movie in which he explains that , between images and power, or politic, there's always some manipulation.Godard compares himself as a french resistant during the WWII, tortured by Gestapo, suffering of lack of freedom with the actual TV.A great short.
chinese_title: 改变形象 - 写给爱人的信
foreign_title: Changer d'image - Lettre à la bien-aimée
